# Purchase of One (1) Ion Chromatograph

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Tender Identification Information**

* Reference Number: CB-9073-84729137
* Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-130
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: September 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 26, 2023, at 14:00:00 (EDT)
* Amendment Date: October 26, 2023

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)
* End User Entities: None

## Requirements

The Quebec Research and Development Center (RDC Quebec) wishes to acquire one (1) ion chromatograph for the water quality laboratory.

## Attachments

The complete request for proposal document can be downloaded from the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9073/npp-apm---e60pv-19equi.pdf

## Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Marie-Pier Parent, Contracting Authority
Email: marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca
Phone: 1-506-531-7263
Address: 2560 Hochelaga Boulevard, Quebec, QC H2C 4S6, Canada

**Important:** Please note that the tender closing date and commencement date have been updated in Amendment 4. Please refer to the attached document for the updated information.

Here is what I changed and why:
